mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO score (
member_id, vote_id, candidate_id, grades, result, description ) VALUES (#{memberId},#{voteId},#{candidateId},#{grades},#{result},#{description})
mapper.select:
SELECT vote_id AS voteId, candidate_id AS candidateId, grades AS grades, result AS result, description AS description
FROM score WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id AS memberId, vote_id AS voteId, candidate_id AS candidateId, grades AS grades, result AS result, description AS description FROM score WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT id AS templateId, template_name AS urlName, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) AS createTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(modify_time) AS modifyTime, template_path AS zipUrl FROM score WHERE 1 = 1
